quiz.title: Coordinate Plane
quiz.subtitle: Unit 3 Quiz 1: Cartesian Coordinate System Basics
quiz.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: In which quadrant does the point $(-4, -7)$ lie?
questions.explanation: Quadrant III: Both x and y are negative.

questions.question: If a point has coordinates $(0, 5)$, on which axis is it located?
questions.explanation: y-axis: x = 0 places it on the vertical axis.

questions.question: If the point $(3, 8)$ is reflected across the x-axis, what are the new coordinates?
questions.explanation: Reflection across x-axis: x stays same, y changes sign.

questions.question: What is the vertical distance between $(2, 5)$ and $(2, -3)$?
If $x > 0$ and $y < 0$, which quadrant are you in?
questions.explanation: Quadrant IV: x positive (right), y negative (down).

questions.question: What are the coordinates of the origin?
Start at $(-2, 3)$. Move 5 units right and 4 units down. Where do you end?
In Quadrant II, what are the signs of the coordinates?
questions.explanation: Quadrant II: x negative (left), y positive (up).
